means: 祈愿语态，祈愿语态的动词

PerfectNetExp.abs: 语气通过曲折变化.通常是通过一组有区别特征的动词变形来表达,比如直陈(indicative)、虚拟(subjunctive)、祈愿(optative)、祈使(imperrative)、条件(conditional)等.这种.
祈愿语气 (Optative) 是表达遥远的可能性 (remote possibility)，例如「但愿他吃饭」。命令语气 (Imperative) 是表达命令 (command)…
大乘止观导论-唯识法相-佛教书籍网 ... nom.nominative（ 主格） opt.optative（ 祈愿式） pass.passive（ 被动式）.
巴利文-汉语词典 ... n. neuter 中性 opt. optative 愿望式 pass. passive 被动式.

list.abs: opp opposite 对方  opt. optional 可选择的  ord. ordinary 普通的  OVA overhead variance analysis 间接费用差异分析  OW offer wanted 寻购启示.
20110128 ... earn Oscar nods as…… contender 争夺者，竞争者 opt for 就是选择 monarch 君主.
光学探测器报警（Opt detector）探测到血路有血。小门未关上或阳光直射造成探测器误动作。

opt out是什么意思_翻译opt out的意思... ... opt in 决定参加 opt out 决定不参加,撤出,退出,辞职 opt to do sth 选择做某事.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French optatif, -ive, from late Latin optativus, from optat- 'chosen', from the verb optare (see opt)

means.word_mean: 1. a mood (as in Greek or Sanskrit) that expresses a wish or hope; expressed in English by modal verbs
2. relating to a mood of verbs in some languages;

auth_sentence.content: I have never used the word optative' in my life, she told me, but, once you make the translation, the guy is really fascinating.
